posts.post_content:
I'm currently looking to buy higher grade Psa graded T206 HOF portraits which present well (graded in the 5 to 7 range)

Will pay strong for the right card, or I have lots of other stuff to trade if thats what you’d prefer.

Players at the top of my want list are:

Beckley
Brown
Chesbro
Clarke
Collins (Eddie)
Collins (Jimmy)
Huggins
Keeler
McGraw (no hat)
McGraw (w/ hat)
Tinker
Waddell

If you have any that I’ve listed which fit the criteria that you'd consider selling please drop me a PM or email me at [url]andreatny@q.com[/url]

Thanks all, Tony
